articles.author: Isaac Johnson
articles.title: Roberto De Zerbi has already identified two Chelsea players he may axe as boss - Football.London
articles.description: Pochettino has now failed to win 16 Premier League games as Chelsea boss and some fans are looking at external options amid the club's poor season
articles.content:
With every game Chelsea fail to win, questions will be raised about the progress of Mauricio Pochettino.
It seems unlikely that Todd Boehly will be sacking the Argentine before the end of the season… [+3645 chars]

articles.author: Matt Kew
articles.title: FIA president Ben Sulayem at centre of further allegations over Las Vegas homologation - Autosport
articles.description: Further allegations have been made against FIA president Mohammed Ben Sulayem, this time claiming he pushed for officials not to certify the Las Vegas Formula 1 circuit, the BBC reports.
articles.content: According to the BBC story, a whistleblower claims that they were told on behest of the FIA president to not homologate the street track ahead of last Novembers inaugural Las Vegas Grand Prix - a fla… [+2242 chars]
